```{r}
library(tidyverse)
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
source("http://www.openintro.org/stat/data/cdc.R") 
ggplot(data = cdc) +
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = age, fill = genhlth)) +
  facet_wrap(~ smoke100)
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = cdc) + 
  geom_smooth(mapping = aes(x = weight, y = age, color = genhlth, linetype = genhlth)) 
```
